comments: Bey (DET) legally saves the ball back into play before his foot comes down out of bounds.
Jordan (BKN) places a hand on Plumlee's (DET) midsection and marginal contact occurs that does not affect his shot attempt.  Additionally, a foul is incorrectly assessed to Green (BKN) on the play.
Jordan (BKN) enters the lane prior to the release of the free throw.
Jordan (BKN) Is already in Bey's (DET) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Harden (BKN) does not dislodge Plumlee (DET) from his defensive position as he drives to the basket.
Plumlee (DET) brushes Harden's (BKN) off arm as he defends the driving shot attempt, and contact is marginal.
Jordan (BKN) places his hand momentarily on Grant's (DET) hip before removing his hand.
Irving (BKN) brushes Grant's (DET) arm as he loses control of the ball but the contact is marginal.
Jordan (BKN) maintains verticality as Grant (DET) is passing the ball.
Irving (BKN) cleanly deflects the ball away from Plumlee (DET).
Jordan (BKN) is already in Bey's (DET) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Green (BKN) legally contests Bey's (DET) jump shot attempt.
Jordan (BKN) is already in Grant's (DET) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Jordan (BKN) dislodges Bey (DET) from his legally obtained rebounding position.
Jordan (BKN) is already in Grant's (DET) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Wright (DET) places a forearm against Harden (BKN) and the contact is marginal during his driving shot attempt.
Bey (DET) inbounds the ball within five seconds.
Green (BKN) jumps to the side of Plumlee (DET) and avoids making contact as he defends the shot near the rim.
Plumlee (DET) commits a take foul on Harden (BKN).
Grant (DET) moves through Harden's (BKN) space and dislodges him from his position when he deflects the ball.
Harden (BKN) and Grant (DET) briefly engage and disengage during the inbound.
